thread.section_title: Atlanta News / Georgia News Section | AJC
thread.title: Man killed when truck hits tree in DeKalb
thread.title_full: Man killed when truck hits tree in DeKalb

author: Steve Burns
title: Man killed when truck hits tree in DeKalb
text:
A 34-year-old man was killed early Tuesday in DeKalb County when his truck crashed into a tree, police said.
Just before 3 a.m., officers responded to the scene on Lithonia Industrial Boulevard near Covington Highway, DeKalb police Maj. Stephen Fore said.
Romondo Brown, who was driving a Ford F-150 pickup truck northbound, drove off the road and hit a tree.
Brown, who was the only person in the truck, died at the scene, Fore said.
The crash remains under investigation.
In other news:
Channel 2's Darryn Moore reports.
